entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 3:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -25.0°C
Wind: NNW 61 km/h gust 75 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blizzard developing early this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then mainly sunny. Blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
